description: The Institute of Creativity and Technology is based in Design District building A1, designed by Barozzi Veiga. It is a future-focused home of experimentation, connection and collaboration. Explore the building and take part in workshops.

factsheet.heading: A Creative University
paragraphs: The Institute of Creativity and Technology is based in Design District building A1, designed by Barozzi Veiga. It is a future-focused home of experimentation, connection and collaboration. Explore the building and take part in RISO printing workshops throughout the weekend.
Take advantage of the Open Day to look around the university state of the art university facilities and take part in workshops.

travel_info:
Additional travel info: The closest tube station in North Greenwich (30 metres). On the 24-hour Jubilee line, it gets you to London Bridge in 8 minutes and Waterloo in 11 minutes.

EMIRATES AIR LINE CABLE CAR
Connecting the Design District to the Royal Docks (near ExCel London) and the DLR.

North Greenwich bus station is a major hub providing direct links across the city.

name: A1 The Institute of Creativity & Technology: Design District
